程序包 jack.task

类 ToDo

java.lang.Object
jack.task.Task
jack.task.ToDo
public class ToDo extends Task
Represents a todo task, which is a type of task without any specific deadline or time. Extends the Task class.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 jack.task.Task

    description, isDone

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the todo task.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Task
      返回:

      public String taskName()
      Returns the task type name for todo tasks.
      覆盖:
      taskName 在类中 Task
      返回:

    • taskToToDo

      public static ToDo taskToToDo(String text) throws Excep
      Creates a new ToDo task from the given text.
      参数:
      text - The description of the todo task.
      返回:
      A new ToDo task with the specified description.
      抛出:
      Excep - If the text is empty.
